concept.title: 233.171 Reporting requirement for protests of solicitations or awards.

conbody.p: Follow the procedures at PGI 233.171 for reporting information on protests involving the same contract award or proposed award that have been filed at both the Government Accountability Office and the United States Court of Federal Claims.
